text: allahvutaiya pokkisankal ennitam irukkinrana enru nan unkalitam kuravillai; maraivanavarrai nan arintavanumallan, niccayamaka nan oru malakku enrum nan kuravillai; evarkalai unkalutaiya kankal ilivaka nokkukinranavo, avarkalukku allah yaroru nanmaiyum alikkamattan enrum nan kuravillai; avarkalin itayankalil ullatai allahve nanku arintavan (ivvunmaikalukku maraka nan etuvum ceytal) niccayamaka nanum aniyayakkararkalil oruvanaki vituven" (enrum kurinar)
